title: Rhagodessa
description: Huge, hairy, nocturnal arachnid carnivores with large heads and mandibles and 10 legs. Yellow head and abdomen, dark brown thorax. Dwell in caves, hunt voraciously.
extras: Suckers: Front legs equipped with suckers for grabbing prey.	Grab: When hit with a sucker, the victim is stuck and will be bitten automatically next round.	Cling: Can walk on walls.
